title: Product Manager CRM
description:
At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, the UK, China, and beyond.
  
To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our products.
  
Tobii Dynavox continues to leverage Salesforce extensively for both Sales and Service functions, supporting over 400 users across Sweden and the USA. As we strive for ongoing optimization and integration, we're seeking a highly motivated and experienced Salesforce professional to join our IT organization as the CRM Owner. You will report directly to the Head of IT.
  
In this critical role, you'll take complete ownership of our Salesforce ecosystem (Sales & Service Cloud), ensuring its ongoing optimization, user adoption, and alignment with our evolving business needs. You'll play a pivotal role in driving data alignment across platforms, supporting multiple business models, and leading the integration with our new Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP system.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Partner with key stakeholders across Sales, Marketing, Customer Service, and IT to understand current processes, identify opportunities for improvement within Salesforce (Sales Cloud & Service Cloud), and ensure data alignment across platforms.
  
Analyze user data and activity to identify trends, pain points, and opportunities for optimization, particularly in the context of supporting multiple business models.
  
Translate the needs of the business into clear and actionable development tasks for our internal team of developers. Focus on data alignment and integration with Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP.
  
Lead the development process by working collaboratively with our team of developers, securing timely delivery, clear communication with stakeholders, and adherence to project requirements.
  
Stay up-to-date on the latest Salesforce features and functionality relevant to Sales and Service Cloud, recommending and implementing improvements as needed, with a focus on data alignment and integration with D365 ERP.
  
Own the backlog of ongoing management and support of the Salesforce CRM system, ensuring data security and compliance in collaboration with our IT security team. Lead the integration efforts with the D365 ERP system.
  
  

**Qualifications:**  

Minimum 5 years of experience working with Salesforce (Sales Cloud and Service Cloud).
  
Proven track record of optimizing and managing a Salesforce CRM platform for a large user base.
  
In-depth understanding of Sales and Service methodologies within a CRM platform.
  
Experience with data alignment and integration strategies across multiple platforms.
  
Demonstrated ability to support and manage multiple business models within a CRM system.
  
Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.
  
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  
Ability to manage multiple priorities, work independently, and lead cross-functional initiatives.
  
Experience with integrating Salesforce with ERP systems is a plus (ideally Microsoft Dynamics 365).
  
  

**Where we stand:**  

We believe diversity not only enriches our workplace culture, but also gives us a strategic advantage. Working with people from a variety of backgrounds and perspectives helps us all become better communicators, better problem solvers, and better human beings. Our differences make us stronger.
  
Tobii Dynavox values equality of opportunity, human dignity, and racial/ethnic and cultural diversity. Tobii Dynavox does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, disability, age, veteran status, ancestry, or national or ethnic origin.
  
Equal Opportunity Employer/AA Women/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled
company_description: Tobii Dynavox’s mission is to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did, or never thought possible.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
This is Worldline
  
Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
  
  

The Opportunity
  
Currently, we are looking for a versatile DevOps Engineer for our real-time card acquiring platform. In this position, you will be a valued member of a highly skilled and truly agile DevOps team, responsible for running and maintaining the business-critical services developed by the team – If you build it, you run it!
  
  

Day-to-Day Responsibilities​
  
Our autonomous agile teams work in a strong DevOps culture. This means that you are responsible for:
  
Delivering on your team’s committed objectives including adapting to whatever is needed to reach the goal you and the team are committed to reach.
  
Securing outstanding service availability and quality.
  
Participate in your team’s day-to-day activities including software development, operations, application monitoring, maintenance and support in addition to being an active member in our agile events like daily stand-ups, planning meetings, retrospectives and demos etc.
  
Collaborating with and helping developers in the team, for example by doing code reviews, participating in pair programming and by sharing your knowledge.
  
  

Who Are We Looking For
  
We look for big thinkers. People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. In practice this means:
  
+3 years confirmed experience in software development. You know Python well enough to write applications for production use. You are comfortable working with relational databases (SQL). You are also comfortable working with version control (using Git, for example).
  
Experience of working with Docker, preferably in Amazon ECS.
  
Experience of developing microservices (preferably both server-based and serverless).
  
Practical experience from working with Amazon Web Services, preferably with infrastructure-as-code via tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation. You are familiar with services such as S3, SQS, AWS Lambda, RDS and ECS.
  
Experience from CI/CD production deployment using Jenkins pipelines (or similar).
  
Experience of working with React is a plus.
  
Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, engineering or another related field.
  
A deep understanding of software quality assurance principles (and preferably experience in test automation).
  
Full working proficiency in Swedish and/or English.
  
  

Perks & Benefits
  
At Worldline you will get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
  
Health contribution.
  
Health check – Every 2nd year.
  
**Pension:** BTP1 & BTP2.
  
Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident).
  
Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave.
  
Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.
  
Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.
  
  

Shape the evolution
  
We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we are looking for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
  
Learn more about life at Worldline at jobs.worldline.com
  
We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.

title: Platina utvecklare – Stockholm heltid
description:

För en av våra kunders räkning söker vi nu en Platina utvecklare. Vår kund är ett väletablerat konsultbolag med stark ekonomi. Teamet anpassar lösningar baserat på plattformen Platina och utvecklar kringliggande applikationer i ASP.NET.

* goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift

* en anställning på ett företag med stabila kundrelationer och goda samarbeten
* balans mellan arbete och fritid
* en individuell kompetensutveckling som är unik för dig och din karriärbana
* en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal och attraktiva förmåner
* en lönemodell som kombinerar anställningstrygghet med rörlig kompensation och vinstdelning

title: Business Administrator
description:
We are now looking for a Junior Business Developer / Business administrator who would support and assist in the growth and development of AFNORD AB.
  
You will have an opportunity to support the development and identification of new business opportunities, develop strategies to pursue these opportunities, and execute plans to meet business growth objectives. Responsibilities Conducting market research to identify potential customers, competitors, and market trends. Assisting in the development of marketing and sales materials, such as presentations, proposals, and sales collateral. Supporting senior business development staff in lead generation and lead qualification activities. Assisting in the preparation of business plans and financial models to evaluate new opportunities. Helping to analyze sales data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as product development and marketing, to execute business development.

title: Software Architect
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**Shaping tomorrow's technology**
---------------------------------


Help us to design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of the Volvo Group Technology team, you’ll help us accelerate our journey by engineering exciting next-gen technologies with a global reach. Be part of our evolution as we strengthen our team. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact.

  

At Vehicle Technology, we are passionate about shaping tomorrow’s technology to create excellent sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions to make the world a better place for future generations. We provide innovative, safe and driver friendly solutions, we develop top quality services and we make our customer operations more efficient by using excellent data insights. We support the Volvo Group engineering community with cutting edge tools and methods.

  

Do you want to use your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

 **About Us:**

  

Thermal Management is a department within Vehicle Technology responsible for developing, delivering, and maintaining an optimized cab climate and vehicle cooling & heating systems for BEV, Fuel Cells, H” ICE and ICE propulsions to all truck brands within the Volvo Group. We are responsible for leading the work with strategies and advanced engineering globally. We are located at Gothenburg & Bangalore and we have close cooperation with the sites in Greensboro and Lyon. We understand the final customer needs and apply our knowledge to develop technical concepts and solutions that satisfy customer and business needs. The work is based on innovation, shared technology, common architecture, and brand uniqueness.

  

We are now looking for an ESW Architect who will be responsible for leading the long-term strategy and implementation of the Thermal management software architecture.

**What will you do?**
---------------------


As an ESW Architect you will be responsible to ensure a robust, high quality, futureproof, maintainable architecture for our next generation software. You will work closely with our product owners, system architects and software development teams.

 **Your key responsibilities include:**

* Communicate general Architecture Vision.
* Create and drive the software architecture design and roadmap.
* Work actively with our next generation software architecture, including recommended module definitions and structure.
* Work with proactive quality and identify key improvements
* Support developers in the implementation of new features and make sure they are in line with architectural guidelines.
* Identifying need for refactoring and improvements to the current code base.
* Support in root cause analysis of complex customer problems and make sure the implementations are in line with architectural guidelines.
**Who are we looking for?**
---------------------------


As a person, you have a strategical mindset and can handle both short- and long-term perspectives for our product. You can take own initiatives and drive them forward with a business and customer mindset. You have excellent communication skills and effectively build formal and informal relationships inside and outside the home organization.

  

You can make sense of complex and sometimes contradictory information to solve problems. You have a willingness and ability to support others and enjoy explaining both vision and technical details.


In our world things are moving fast and you need to adapt to changing conditions.

 **Relevant Experience:**

* 8+ years of experience in Embedded SW development
* 4+ years of experience in working as an ESW Architect
* Good knowledge of Vector Autosar, Matlab, Simulink, C, C++ and Python
* Good knowledge of CI/CD and Test automation frameworks
* Good knowledge of Configuration Management and Cyber Security
* Good knowledge of Software Architecture Defining Tools and UML designing
* Knowledge of ASPICE, Software FMEA and DRBFM
* Awareness of Quality Management Process, 8D etc
* Experience in the Automotive industry
* Knowledge and experience in how to create and drive roadmaps and vision
* Great communication and collaboration skills
* Good presentation skills
* Fluent in English

  

Applicants shall have an M.Sc in computer science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering or similar technical field of study or equivalent work experience.

 **Meritorious to have:**

* Volvo Specific tool knowledge & experience
* Experience from Thermal Management area
**Ready for the next move?**
----------------------------


Volvo Group believes in diversity, equity, and inclusion and offers a safe environment to grow. Use your open mind and can-do attitude to help us steer our transportation solutions toward a more sustainable tomorrow.

  

The location for the position is Gothenburg, Sweden. If you are based in another location, but your skills are a good fit, we strongly encourage you to apply anyway. Relocation support can be provided if needed. Come, join us as we take our solutions into a new era and make modern life possible. Let's drive progress together.

  

If you are interested in this position and want to know more you are welcome to contact Arpitha Bg, Talent Advisor - arpitha.bangalore.giri@consultant.volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.

title: Product Information Security Officer, Volvo Group
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

  

We are building new ways of working with Product Information Security to enable our business to thrive.

  

Do you want to be part of a setting up and paving the way how the Volvo Group work with Product Information Security?

**What is our offer to you? Who are we?**
-----------------------------------------


Volvo Group drives prosperity through transport solutions, offering trucks, buses, construction equipment, power solutions for marine and industrial applications, financing and services that increase our customers’ uptime and productivity. The Volvo Group is committed to shaping the future landscape of sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions. We make our customers win.

 **Product Information Security** is a new area within Information Security. We are responsible for the second level of defense in the areas of Product Information Security and Product Cybersecurity within the Volvo group. We are a growing global team of engaged and experienced people. We hope you will join us in creating an even more secure future for the Volvo Group.

  

In this role you will work across all businesses of Volvo Group to support the resilience and product information security activities. You will set requirements, support to build an effective and comprehensive product information security framework, so that Volvo Group operates securely across all the product ecosystems.

  

The position reports directly to the Director Product Information Security.

 **This is how you will make an impact**

  

You will work across different functions and product development organizations in the Volvo Group to strengthen and build common capabilities in the Product Information Security domain. The position will be responsible to develop and drive appointed areas in the Product Information Security roadmap to enable and follow up product information security across the Volvo Group. Strong drive and stakeholder management skills are needed to successfully collaborate and create business value across different organizations.

 **Overall responsibilities of the role will be:**

  

* Drive development and implementation of initiatives and projects in the Product Information Security Roadmap
* Drive and follow up practical implementation of group-wide product information security and product cybersecurity governance and frameworks
* Drive change management activities to ensure different stakeholders understand and apply principles, directives and guidelines in respective organizations
* Facilitate co-creation with various stakeholders in the organization
* Coordinate information security incidents on Volvo Group level
**Who are you?**
----------------


You will lead, coordinate and collaborate on various Product Information Security topics with multiple stakeholders across the Volvo Group. As this job is much about establishing the area and create successful collaborations, we need you to be a leader with strong drive and good communication skills.  

We also value your holistic and problem-solving approach, as you will play a key role in the organization to identify and create pragmatic but robust solutions to new challenges. As this job includes managing urgent activities as well as long-term initiatives, we believe it is important that you can work with a degree of uncertainty and that you demonstrate good prioritization skills.

**Qualifications required to be successful in this role:**
----------------------------------------------------------

* Extensive experience in Product Cybersecurity, Information security or Cyber security in a complex global product development organization.
* Extensive practical experience from Information Security incident management
* Ability to work effectively with a wide range of stakeholders including developers, security teams and senior management
* Good understanding of Information security related regulations, standards and best practices
* Master's degree or higher in information technology, computer science, cybersecurity, communication, or related field
* Product Cybersecurity and Information Security certifications are considered a strong merit
* Strong interpersonal and stakeholder management skills
* Fluency in English, written and spoken

  

In addition to the qualifications above, your personality will be the most important asset of all. If you are ready to drive change in Product Information Security in a global organization at the forefront of technology, come and join us.


This position is based in Gothenburg, Sweden and requires occasional travel.

  

Last application date is June 16, 2024 but please send your application as soon as possible as we will review applications continuously.

 **For further information or questions, please contact**

  

Hiring manager, David Haglund, Director Product Information Security, david.haglund@volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Legal & Compliance** contributes to realizing the vision of the Volvo Group by coordinating and providing services within the following areas: Legal, Governance, Security and Internal Audit. With Volvo Group Legal & Compliance you will be part of a global and diverse team of highly skilled professionals who work with passion, trust each other and embrace change to stay ahead.

title: Generativ AI Support
description:
*Redo att hitta din grej? Testa nytt, utbyt erfarenheter och upptäck vad du verkligen gillar att göra.*


Din roll


Tycker du att AI är fascinerande, spännande och något som du gärna lär dig mer om? Fortsätt läsa! Sektionen Data & AI Platforms står inför en ny utmaning och behöver någon som kan hjälpa till med support för vår AI Platform när tjänsten går live på bred front inom Saab. Då målet är att så många som möjligt, dvs. potentiellt 20000 medarbetare, ska kunna använda tjänsten, kan det bli väldigt många frågor.


Ditt uppdrag kommer vara att agera support kring frågor om generativ AI, t.ex. hur man skriver bra och effektiva prompts. Du kommer också att få marknadsföra och inspirera, t.ex. genom att ge tips och idéer på hur man kan använda GenAI i olika roller. Ta emot förfrågningar och svara personer som har behov av stöd med tjänsten. Sammanställa utmaningar som inte går att lösa direkt och slussa dessa vidare till utvecklingsteamet för GenAI.


Du kommer även bevaka interna kanaler och få det att kännas som ett aktivt community för generativ AI. Genom detta kommer du bygga en knowledge base och skapa guidelines (som potentiellt på sikt kan användas för att vår AI själv ska kunna svara på frågor om sig själv). Hålla dig uppdaterad och se till att informationen sprids när GenAI-plattformen får nya förmågor, t.ex:

* Nya språkmodeller blir tillgängliga
* Möjlighet att läsa dokument
* Möjlighet att integrera mot AI platformen via API'er
* Möjlighet att skapa RAG-applikationer


Din profil


Den vi söker är en nyfiken, kommunikativ, positiv och service minded person. Vi ser att du har ett stort intresse för Generativ AI som ger uttryck i din nyfikenhet för ämnet. För denna roll är det fördelaktigt om du snabbt kan ta till dig information och förmedla det på ett strukturerat sätt. Vi ser därav att du kan har en god förmåga att skapa tydligt innehåll som också är lätt för andra att förstå. Det är också ett krav att du har förståelse för mjukvaruutveckling - för att kunna stötta även i kodgenererings-case.


Vi ser gärna att du har magisterexamen inom IT eller data, gärna med inriktning mot data science, maskininlärning eller artificiell intelligens eller likvärdigt.


I rollen som Gen AI Support har du möjligheten att lära känna organisationen, bygga ett kontaktnät och utvecklas vidare och bygga nya förmågor, t.ex. som Data Engineer, Data Analyst, Data Scientist, AI Developer eller Data & AI Platform Developer.

*Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.*


Vad du blir en del av


Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.


Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här


Om du är intresserad av vilka förmåner som du kan ta del av som anställd på Saab i Sverige, kan du läsa om dem här. Våra värderingar kan du läsa om här.

*Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.*
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Workflow Business Analyst within Financial Crime Prevention\u007C SEB, Stockholm
description:
The recently established Financial Crime Prevention (FCP) function will further accelerate SEBs deployment of advanced financial crime prevention capabilities to continuously meet regulatory expectations and to become a leader in fighting financial crime. The Financial Crime Prevention (FCP) function encompasses the areas of Fraud Prevention, AML transaction monitoring, sanctions, and customer screening. Fighting financial crime need to have an intelligence-led and data-driven approach where process automation will be core component of our FCP effort.

As we continue to evolve, we seek a dynamic and experienced professional to join our team as a Workflow Business Analyst.**What you will be doing**As a Workflow Business Analyst you will play a very important role in the process automation journey by being the essential link between the business and DEV teams and ensuring that business needs are met optimally and efficiently. Working together with Product stakeholders you will analyze business requirements and provide the best solutions for implementation. You will work in a diverse environment with teams and colleagues across international sites.  

In this position you will be responsible for:* Support business in defining the to-be process,
* Helping the business to understand technical capabilities, suggesting the best possible solutions, and explaining limitations,
* Collect business requirements and ensure the final product meets expectations,
* Providing work estimates and timely updates on solution analysis progress,
* Collaboration with business representatives, IT architects and other developers on defining the process implementation design,
* Analyzing and designing process solution ensuring it follows solution development best-practices,
* Preparing solution documentation,
* Collaboration with other teams on helping to resolve solution-based problems.

**Who we are looking for:*** Work experience with IBM BAW or any other product used for workflow automation would be an advantage,
* Experience in BPMN and process automation area would be an advantage,
* Work experience in an analytical role (IT area),
* Excellent in English (speaking and writing),
* Motivated, positive, and quick learner,
* Able to manage his/her time and prioritize,
* Up for a challenge and willing to take ownership,
* Experience with Agile/SAFe would be very good to have,
* Experience within Financial Crime Prevention is a plus.


**What we offer:*** Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment,
* Friendly and welcoming culture,
* Long-term stability,
* Extensive training and learning opportunities,
* Work-life balance & hybrid way of working,
* Additional vacation and volunteering days,
* Comprehensive health insurance,
* Mobility within a large global company,
* Agile and modern ways of working.


**Application details**
Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to the Financial Crime Prevention unit. Candidates will be reviewed and selected on an ongoing basis, and you are welcome to submit your application as soon as possible, but no later than the 16th of June 2024.  

  

Should you have any questions regarding the position, you can contact Morten Rufus Blas, Head of FCP Advanced Analytics, at morten-rufus.blas@seb.se.  

  

We look forward to hearing from you!

**Learn more about working at** **SEBwww.sebgroup.com/career***It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe, or where they come from.*
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
### **Want to Join Frends Growth Journey to the leading eiPaaS in the Nordics and Europe?**

 **Do you have an interest** in learning how to implement integration solutions **using** **Frends eiPaaS?** Do you have several years of experience through work in the **back end,** and do **databases** interest you? Do you enjoy solving the technical challenges of different customers and dare to challenge them? Can you visit our Stockholm office on a weekly/monthly basis and speak fluent Swedish?


If you answer Yes, contact us on a low threshold, and let's discuss more - no need for CV´s or cover letters.


*”On the integration side, interfaces and technologies are constantly evolving and changing, which means that you can constantly explore and learn new things and deepen your skills.”* -Integration Developer, Frends.

**➡️**

### **We offer you**

* **a competitive salary adequate to your expertise** **50-63K SEK**
* interesting and **challenging projects** in different fields
* the opportunity to further develop and **expand your skills**
* an employer who supports in various life situations
* **flexible** **work mode**
* **safe and stable workplace**
* skilled co-workers and supportive supervisor
* low hierarchy, and a flexible and relaxed organizational culture
* wide employee benefits


 Top workmates coupled with challenging and versatile projects with a powerful platform that enables digitalization and process automation – that’s**Frendszone.** Strong team spirit as well as trust, freedom, and flexibility, are the cornerstones of our culture.

#### **Frends**

**The product you will be working on** and with is our very own in-house solution Frends iPaaS which is developed initially in Finland. It´s a low-code, hybrid integration platform with its roots spanning back three decades. So the product is not in its very early stages and certainly not stuck in the 90's - it has been and is constantly being developed. The latest incarnation of the product utilizes modern technologies and cloud services. Frends is based on C# and runs on Azure.


Frends will help you deliver integration features and automate business processes of our customers. With us you get to see the development of the modern enterprise iPaaS platform from various angles.

 **➡️ Read more what it's like to develop integrations with Frends iPaaS** from our blog which includes a demo-video and watch our webinar. Want to learn more about Frends? You can go through our free learning path "L0 Getting Started" in Frends Academy and see what Frends is all about.

 **In our work, you will get to use also** Azure's various technologies, such as Machine Learning and Data Factory. The magic words for success are REST, JSON, XML, XSLT, and SQL. In addition, knowledge of API architectures, API Management, GraphQL, and LINQ are things we value - which you'll also get to learn.

  

If you don’t meet all of the checkpoints, don’t worry. If you believe that you’re the right person for us, we might just believe that as well. Get in touch, and let´s discuss more!

* **Interested to join Frends?**

 **If this piqued your interest, we hope to hear from you!**

  

We do not expect excellent CVs or application letters, but we hope you will contact us via our application form or by emailing Robert, Frends Head of Delivery in Sweden: robert.bansell@frends.com.


The start is flexible according to your situation.


The role requires good **English and fluent Swedish and living in Sweden.** Our office is in Stockholm (Katarinavägen), so we request to visit the office on a weekly/monthly basis.

**➡️**

#### **Want to know more about Frends?**

**Frends eiPaaS**isour own, Nordic, modern, low-code integration platform. Frends solves the digitalization challenges of both global and smaller customers and in both private and public sectors in various industries. As a brand Frends is over 30 years old but the recent rise of iPaaS Frends has seen explosive growth in the Nordic and Europe markets. It has been and is constantly being developed by our own R&D team. The latest incarnation of the product utilizes modern technologies and cloud services.

**Frends is recognized in the** **Gartner*****®*** **Magic Quadrant™** for Integration Platform as a Service, Worldwide. Frends was also awarded in G2 review with the "Fastest Implementation" badge in 2023.

  

Visit our webpage. Check out our use cases. Listen to our webinars.

title: Integrationsutvecklare
description:
### **Vill du delta i Frends satsning att bli marknadsledande eiPaaS?**


Den nordiska integrationsplattformen **Frends** växer och vi förstärker vårt team i Sverige med utvecklare som gillar integrationer och kommunikation.

* **Om nedan passar in på dig, tveka inte att kontakta oss så vi kan diskutera mer.**
* Fascineras du av system och **integrationer** inom och mellan företag?
* Har du förståelse och erfarenhet av **IT-system** och olika sätt att integrera dessa?
* Trivs du med flöden, **utveckling**, dataformat, SQL, APIer och Webhooks?
* Klurar du på **automation**, datahantering, maskininlärning och artificiell intelligens?
* Gillar du att både vara med från ax till limpa, och att **djupdyka** i tekniska detaljer?
* Vill du knyta ihop allt detta och implementera integrationslösningar med **Frends**?


Du är handlingskraftig och **självgående**, där du klarar allt från att hantera kunder och svåra problemställningar till att mejsla fram lämplig **arkitektur**, samt utveckla och konfigurera kompletta lösningar. Där allt handlar om att på bästa sätt hjälpa våra kunder att **lyckas** integrera system och data med hjälp av **Frend**s eiPaaS.  

  



*”Inom integration utvecklas och förändras gränssnitten och teknologierna kontinuerligt, vilket betyder att du ständigt kan utforska och lära dig nya saker och fördjupa din kompetens.”* *– Integrationsutvecklare, Frends.*


### **Hörnstenarna i vår arbetskultur är en stark laganda, tillit, frihet och flexibilitet - Vi kallar det Frendszone.**


Tänk att du blir landsatt på en öde ö mitt i natten, det är becksvart och du vet ingenting om läget eller vad din uppgift egentligen är - förutom att åstadkomma hjältedåd. Du måste skaffa dig en god överblick, ta fram en plan och lösning - till din hjälp har du ett verktyg - **Frends**.


Såklart händer det också att vi har en vanlig dag på kontoret, med kaffe och teamwork. Men du, ha alltid ditt överlevnadskit nära till hands...  

Och tänk på att Frends och kollegor alltid stöttar dig både i arbetslivet och olika livssituationer.

#### **Vi erbjuder**

* en konkurrenskraftig lön som motsvarar din expertis **(45-63K SEK)**
* intressanta och utmanande projekt, möjligheten att vidareutvecklas
* en arbetsgivare som stöttar dig i olika livssituationer, låg hierarki, flexibel och avslappnad organisationskultur.


➡️ **Läs mer om** det dagliga arbetet på vår **blogg**.

####  **Känner du igen dig och är intresserad av att jobba hos Frends?**


Vill du delta i Frends satsning att bli ledande eiPaaS i Norden, Europa och globalt? Då hoppas vi att du kontaktar oss via ansökningsformuläret eller mejlar Robert, Head of Delivery i Sverige: robert.bansell@frends.com.


Positionen kräver flytande **svenska** och engelska och att **du bor i Sverige** **med fokus på kontoret i Stockholm** i det här fallet (besöker kontoret vecko-/månadsvis).

#### **Vill du veta mer om Frends?**

**Frends eiPaaS** är vår egen, nordiska, moderna low-code integrationsplattform som möter digitaliseringsutmaningar för såväl globala som mindre **kunder****,** både inom privat och offentlig sektor. Som varumärke har Frends funnits i över 30 år och med den senaste tidens uppgång för iPaaS har Frends fått en explosiv tillväxt i Norden och Europa, samt växande närvaro globalt. Den senaste versionen av produkten bygger på modern teknologi och molntjänster och vidareutvecklas kontinuerligt av vårt R&D team.


➡️ **Läs mer om att utveckla integrationer med Frends** iPaaS på vår **blogg**, där det också finns en demovideo, och kolla våra **webbsändningar**. Du kan ta vår gratis kurs **Frends Fundamentals - Getting Started** i Frends Academy och se vad Frends egentligen handlar om.  

  



Frends eiPaaS erkänns också av Gartners ledande analytiker och är med i **Gartner® Magic** **Quadrant™****,** bland världens mest framstående integrationsplattformar. **Frends** belönades i **G2** review med "Fastest Implementation" emblem år 2023.  

  



Besök vår **webbplats**, kolla våra **användningsfall** och lyssna på våra **webbsändningar**. Läs mer om **Frendszone** i våra blogginlägg.

title: Lead Product Designer (UI/UX)
description:
### **Responsibilities**

* Create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that effectively communicate design concepts and user flows
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and understand user requirements and business goals
* Conduct user research, usability testing, and gather feedback to iterate and improve designs
* Create and maintain design systems, style guides, and UI component libraries to ensure consistency across projects
* Stay up-to-date with current design trends, techniques, and technologies to continuously enhance design processes
* Work closely with developers to implement and refine designs

#pf

**Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field
* Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role
* 4-5 years of Industry experience.
* Strong portfolio showcasing your design process and projects
* Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, or similar software
* Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, usability, and accessibility standards
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills
* Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, agile environment
* Experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is a plus

title: Utvecklare med Intresse för Operativsystem till Saab
description:
Är du en utvecklare med ett extra intresse för operativsystem och plattformar? Har du erfarenhet av att jobba i Linuxmiljö? Vår kund är världsledande inom kommunikation och utmanar ständigt gränsen för vad som är tekniskt möjligt. Hit söker vi dig som vill vara med och arbeta mot bolagets gemensamma mål – att göra världen till en säkrare plats.
  
  

**OM KUNDFÖRETAGET:**  

Saab är ett globalt försvars- och säkerhetsföretag verksamt inom flyg-, land- och marinförsvar, civil säkerhet och kommersiell flygteknik. De är runt 19 000 medarbetare och har verksamhet på alla kontinenter. Tekniskt är de ledande inom många områden och en femtedel av deras intäkter går till forskning och utveckling. Saab ser mångfald som en tillgång och där du som medarbetare får stort ansvar och goda utvecklingsmöjligheter, där de respekterar varje människas behov av ett liv utanför arbetet.
  
  

**OM TJÄNSTEN:**  

Saab erbjuder effektiva lösningar för övervakning och beslutsstöd i arbetet med att upptäcka och skydda mot olika typer av hot. Här erbjuds du arbete i en stimulerande miljö som präglas av samarbete både i utvecklings- och kundprojekt. I rollen blir du en del av organisationens utvecklingsteam i Göteborg. Tillsammans ansvarar ni för planering och fördelning av arbetsuppgifter som ni gemensamt tar er ann och löser i nära samarbete med andra avdelningar och team.
  
  

Vi söker nu en test- och verifieringsingenjör som ska ansluta till ett större team som består av juniora såväl som seniora ingenjörer som alla arbetar med operativsystemet. I rollen som test- och verifieringsingenjör kommer du att arbeta med kärnan för dataplattformen. Du kommer att arbeta med programvaran där du ansvarar för att utföra bland annat test och verifiering, autotestning och framtagning av testfall.
  
  

**VI SÖKER DIG SOM:**  

Har en eftergymnasial utbildning från universitet eller högskola med inriktning inom IT, programvarutest eller motsvarande utbildning. Du kan vara helt nyexaminerad men det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att sitta med ett eller fler av följande:
  
  

Linux OS
  
Python
  
Git
  
ClearCase
  
Squish
  
Robot framework
  
  

Därutöver kommer stor vikt läggas vid personlig lämplighet. För att du ska trivas och lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är positiv, resultatorienterad och en sann lagspelare. Du är trygg i att presentera tekniska lösningar och du gillar att arbeta i team. Att hantera nya frågeställningar ser du som en naturlig del av ditt arbete, där du känner dig trygg i att välja rätt vägar för ett resultat med hög kvalitet. Därutöver ser vi gärna att du är en person som strävar efter utveckling på ett personligt såväl som professionellt plan och är beredd att ta dig ann det som krävs för att följa med i bolagets tillväxtresa framåt.
  
  

Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningen har vår kund krav på säkerhetsklassplacering vilket kan medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
  
  

**OM ANSTÄLLNINGEN:**  

Detta är ett konsultuppdrag vilket innebär att du till en början kommer att vara anställd av Friday. Ambitionen från Kunden och vår sida är att du därefter blir direktanställd hos kunden.
  
  

**ÖVRIG INFO:**  

**Omfattning:** Heltid.
  
**Start:** Augusti-september 2024.
  
**Placering:** Göteborg.
  
**Rekryteringsansvarig:** Marta Laszewska.
  
**Lön:** Marknadsmässig.
  
  

Ansök genom att klicka på länken nedan. Kom ihåg att vara snabb med din ansökan då vi gör löpande urval av kandidater och att annonsen kan stängs ner innan tjänsten är tillsatt om vi gått över till urvals och intervjufasen.
  
  

**OM FRIDAY:**  

Genom att vara en partner både till våra kandidater och kunder strävar vi efter att hitta den bästa matchningen. Det gör vi genom att lära känna våra kunder och kandidater på riktigt! Vi ser självklart till att kunskaps- och erfarenhetskrav matchar, men framförallt lägger vi vikt vid samsyn kring värderingar och företagskultur som båda parter värdesätter.
  
  

Vår passion är att hjälpa människor till rätt roll, arbetsplats och sammanhang inom IT och teknik. Därför grundade vi Friday med ambition att hjälpa dig till jobbet som ger dig fredagskänslan – varje dag!
  
  

Vi riktar oss främst till dig som är i början av din karriär eller studerar vid högskola/universitet inom IT och Teknik.
  
  

Vår övertygelse är att människor uppnår sin fulla potential när man ser fram emot att gå till jobbet varje morgon. ”Friday – everyday”, hur låter det?

title: Tech Lead
description:
About CarlaAt Carla, we believe that more people should be able to drive electric vehicles. Therefore, we have set out to build the safest, most convenient and transparent way to sell, buy, or lease an electric car.
  
Carla was founded in 2020 in Stockholm, with strong VC backing. We are now in an exciting growth phase and are looking for like minded people. That means being driven, humble, and deeply in love with creating outstanding customer experiences.
  
Recruitment needWe’re hiring a Tech Lead to drive both technical discovery and delivery of projects within an agile team context, and make sure we make long-term enhancements to our technology stack and team performance. We’re looking for a person who likes to both be hands-on in code as well as coach other engineers and engage with stakeholders to define key projects for the company’s success. You will manage four other engineers in one of two cross-functional product teams as well as take a backend tech lead role across our whole platform.
  
In this role you will report directly to Carla's CPTO.
  
  

**Responsibilities include:**  

Technical Leadership and Strategy
  
Lead and manage a small team of developers (backend and frontend) within our business critical Operations area that handles all car repairs and inbound/outbound logistics, ensuring projects align with company objectives and deliver substantial results.
  
Develop and execute clear, effective technical strategies to enhance team efficiency and project output.
  
  

Hands-On Technical Involvement
  
Participate hands-on in coding, debugging, and integrating systems to ensure quality outcomes.
  
Work closely with product management and other departments to deliver solutions that meet both technical and business needs.
  
  

Resource Management and System Optimization
  
Oversee resource allocation to maximize team productivity and meet deadlines.
  
Regularly evaluate and improve system performance and architecture to ensure scalability and reliability.
  
  

System Development and Quality Assurance
  
Guide the development and deployment of robust systems across the full tech team, using GoLang, ReScript, and TypeScript, with special emphasis on backend.
  
Implement quality assurance processes to maintain high standards for system stability, performance, and security.
  
  

Integration and Technical Debt Management
  
Manage integrations with external systems and APIs to improve platform functionality.
  
Proactively identify and address technical debt to enhance code maintainability and system scalability.
  
  

Data Engineering
  
Support initiatives to utilize company data through tools like BigQuery and LookerStudio, integrating with Fivetran and directly with BQ for efficient data accessibility.
  
  

Qualifications
  
Strong background in software development and leadership, with a record of implementing practical, effective technical solutions, particularly on the backend side.
  
Proficient in Go, ReScript/Elm and/or TypeScript, and deep understanding of software design principles.
  
Excellent communication skills and the ability to lead and collaborate effectively with diverse teams.
  
Experienced in cloud-based architectures and familiar with various development methodologies and project management practices.
  
  

What is in it for you?Most of all, this is a fantastic opportunity to work for a category-defining company, with great values, and a business model that doesn't talk about sustainability - but is based on it. Apart from that, we offer:
  
We’re fast, both in terms of car delivery, price-setting process and when it comes to growing our business. We have no plans on stopping anytime soon, and hopefully, this is where you come in!
  
  

Joining one of Sweden’s LinkedIn 2022 & 2023 Top 10 Startups
  
A career-defining role at an early-stage startup and an opportunity to grow and learn from knowledgeable co-workers
  
We’re a start-up, which means we work smarter, not harder. Life-work balance still plays an important role in creating long-lasting productivity and output
  
A workplace that believes strength is found in diversity. We hire people regardless of background, education, experience or gender
  
Market competitive salary and stock option program
  
  

So,If you are looking to lead a capable team and directly impact both product quality and team effectiveness, apply today!

title: Senior Backend Software Engineer - Stockholm
description:
About Brite
  
Brite Payments is a leading Open Banking-powered Account to Account (A2A) payment provider of Instant Payments and Instant Payouts. We provide a convenient transaction experience for consumers and reduce the risk in the payment process for merchants. Founded in Stockholm in 2019, Brite is committed to providing the best possible payment solution for everyone involved in a transaction.
  
The team behind Brite has worked with launching the first-generation of fintech companies before founding Brite. We know the market landscape, technologies, opportunities, and challenges. Now we channel all those experiences into developing modern solutions that will benefit both merchants and end-users.
  
Want to join us on our journey? The future is brite!
  
What you will do
  
As a Senior Software Engineer at Brite you will work with our core team of highly skilled developers. Your tasks will be to develop and build a scalable and future-proof framework. You will work on building components to bridge between us and the banks across Europe, in order to deliver authentication (AIS) and payment initiation (PIS). As a Developer at Brite, you will have a major impact on building the foundation of our core platform. With that said, you will be a vital part of the next fintech unicorn!
  
Are you a brite mind?
  
Experience in systems development in Python, GO and Angular
  
Experience with Cloud Computing (Google cloud)
  
At least 3 years of developer work experience
  
  

**Meriting experience:**  

AWS, Azure
  
Kubernetes
  
Microservice architecture
  
  

**Preferred skills:**  

A degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience
  
Experience from building scalable, service-oriented architectures
  
Experience from working with transaction-intensive systems
  
Experience with Docker
  
Experience with Javascript/Typescript
  
Experience with information security from a systems development perspective (OWASP, encryption, etc.)
  
  

What we offer
  
An optimistic, caring, and inclusive culture where we want you to be yourself
  
A dynamic, fast-paced, and innovative environment where you will have the possibility to make an impact from your first day onwards.
  
A flat organization, friendly colleagues, and fast decision-making
  
An environment where we start small and learn fast to do big things
  
A team that cares about sharing, collaborative work, and prestigeless approach
  
A yearly wellness allowance and Tuesday breakfasts at the office
  
... and you will be part of a growing team of fun and skilled people

title: Senior Backend Developer
company: ANTS Akademiskt Nätverk av Tekniska Studenter AB
description:
About Tiptapp
  
Tiptapp is the future of moving things around. Our app matches you in real-time to other users that have extra space in their vehicle and time to give your stuff a ride from a to b. You get instant help with deliveries, shopping, moves and recycling of items of any size. This way we help users cope with everyday logistics while providing an important source of extra income for others. By decreasing the number of cars on the road and increasing reuse and recycle rates, we directly contribute to reducing the environmental impact in the cities where we operate. In 2023, Tiptapp’s platform paid out 6.9 Million Euros to helping users, saved an estimated 51 tonnes of CO2 emissions through48,300 fewer car rides, and gave 278,000 reusable items a new home.
  
Tiptapp launched in Stockholm in 2016 and is backed by investors that have previously built and backed leading European tech companies like Spotify, Avito, Klarna, and Revolut. We operate across Sweden, London, Berlinand Lisbon with +300,000 users and have been growing quickly since the start. We are now a profitable company and are preparing for rapid international expansion.
  
We are looking for a senior backend developer to join our team
  
If you love backend development and would like to be a part of an experienced team and a company that is expanding in the world then let's have a chat!Our team is small and transparent. We value skills, talent and experience but even more so a get-things-done attitue, fearlessness and willingness to learn and evolve.
  
We offer an opportunity to play a key role, with a clear influence, in developing our system for the future.
  
What you will be working with
  
You will be engineering, developing and evolving secure as well as scalable APIs that serve our apps and partner integrations.
  
Writing and managing automated tests for core parts of our services.
  
Making sure our production environment is up and running and purring like a kitten.
  
Working in unison with product owners, implementing ideas and features as well as shipping them to production.
  
What it is like to work at Tiptapp You would join a small team of experienced senior developers.
  
We have a collaborative decision making process with lots of workshops.
  
Our work routines and tools are set up for remote work. But if you are in the Stockholm area, we do have an office in the middle of the city. Barring some occasional visit to HQ, you can be 100% remote. We currently have a hybrid team where some are fully remote and others work at our shared office a few days a week.
  
Working hours are mostly flexible, but we have some synchronous work around 9:30–15 CET, so your timezone should not be too far off.
  
We practice freedom with responsibility, you are expected to be self-driven, to pull your own weight and then some.
  
Yearly offsite trips — optional of course — but fun!
  
  

We are a hardworking but easygoing group of diverse personalities who love to have fun both at and off work - We love playing games online and offline, doing BBQs, and every year we go on a trip abroad together. We take pride in our strong culture of experimenting, flat and participatory decision-making and always helping each other out, and we think you should too!
  
Who we are looking for
  
We would like to see that you have...
  
5+ years of experience with backend or full-stack development
  
BS or MS in Computer Science or a relevant field
  
Solid skills in Node.js
  
Solid skills in JavaScript/ES6+
  
Solid skills in MongoDB
  
Some knowledge of dev-ops
  
Proven track record of taking full responsibility
  
Analytical abilities and business understanding
  
  

Apart from that we see that you are based in the EU.
  
  

And even better if you have experience with...
  
Amazon Web Services
  
Payment platforms such as Adyen and/or Stripe
  
Deployment and operations
  
Automated testing
  
Big data and analytics
  
Modern web development
  
Native Android development
  
Native iOS development
  
What we offer
  
Work with a team that is obsessed with innovation and iteration, pushing the frontier of the sharing economy
  
Be part of a company that has substantial impact on the environment and society
  
Flexible work hours with full possibility to work remotely
  
Competitive salary
  
30 days vacation
  
Pension plan
  
Wellness allowance (~500 per year)
  
Application
  
We want to have a diversified team with regards to cultural backgrounds and gender. Therefore we really want to encourageevery personqualified to get in touch with us.We look forward to hearing from you!
  
Please notethatwe currently only accept applications from EU residents and will not sponsor newVISAs, we can however take over and help extend existing VISAs.

title: Sigma Technology söker flera IT-Tekniker med fokus Linux
description:
Sigma Technology söker flera IT-Tekniker med fokus Linux
Sverige Ansök senast 2024-09-30


### **Jobbeskrivning**



**Sigma Technology IT Infra AB söker konsulter för uppdrag** **inom LINUX**



Sigma Technology IT Infra AB söker konsulter för uppdrag hos våra kunder inom både den privata och offentliga sektorn i Linköping. Uppdragen är på 100%, start efter överenskommelse och uppdraget sträcker sig tillsvidare.


**Ansvarsområden:**



* Förvaltning och vidareutveckling av tekniska tjänster i kundens verksamhet.
* Standardisering, effektivisering och automatisering av arbetssätt och system.
* Drifts- och supportarbete inklusive felsökning och installationer.
* Patchhantering och uppgradering av servermiljön.
* Säkerställande av efterlevnad av gällande säkerhetskrav.
* Aktivt deltagande i teknikförbättringsarbete.


**Krav:**



* Erfarenhet inom LINUX-serverdrift.
* Kunskaper i Bash eller Python.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande:**



* Erfarenhet av Red Hat, SUSE Manager eller liknande verktyg.
* Erfarenhet av Ansible, Dockers, Kubernetes.
* Erfarenhet av systemhärdning.


**Övrig information:**



* Säkerhetsskyddsklassificering kan förekomma och kräver godkännande enligt gällande bestämmelser.
* Säkerhetsklassinplacering kan medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
* Urval sker löpande.

### **Vi erbjuder**



Vi är stolta över att våra medarbetare har röstat fram oss bland Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare i hela 11 år. Vi är också uppmärksammade som ett av Sveriges bäst förvaltade företag av Deloitte, i samarbete med Nasdaq. Förra året uppnådde vi den prestigefyllda Golden-statusen, vilket markerar vårt erkännande under flera år i rad (2019-2023).



Vi värdesätter våra medarbetare och tror på en arbetsmiljö där du kan växa och trivas. Därför erbjuder vi kollektivavtal för att säkerställa dina anställningsvillkor och trygghet. För att främja din hälsa och välbefinnande har vi ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag. Vi har också möjlighet att investera i din professionella utveckling genom kompetensutveckling (utbildningar eller certifieringar).


Vi förstår vikten av stöttning från din chef, och erbjuder en tillgänglig och öppen kommunikation för att säkerställa att du får det stöd du behöver. För att skapa en positiv start inför helgen bjuder vi in till gemensamma fredagsfrukostar där du kan koppla av och umgås med dina kollegor.


För oss är dessa förmåner och förutsättningar en självklarhet för att skapa en arbetsplats där du kan växa, må bra och känna dig som en del av sigma-gemenskapen.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan om du tror att vi är rätt arbetsgivare för dig!

title: Nätverkstekniker Linköping
description:
Nätverkstekniker Linköping
Sverige Ansök senast 2024-09-30


### **Jobbeskrivning**



**Karriärmöjlighet som Nätverkstekniker hos Sigma Technology IT Infra AB i Linköping**



Sigma Technology IT Infra AB söker flera nätverkstekniker, både juniora och seniora, för spännande konsultuppdrag i Linköping. Våra kunder verkar i både den offentliga och privata sektorn. Arbetet som uppdraget avser fokuserar på IT-lösningar för drift, underhåll och uppgradering av nätverksinfrastruktur.



**Om Uppdraget:**



* **Anställning:** i bolaget IT Infra AB
* **Startdatum:** Efter överenskommelse
* **Arbetsplats:** Linköping


**Ansvarsområden:**



* Arbeta med pågående projekt och förvaltningar.
* Drift, utveckling och uppgraderingar av nätverksinfrastruktur.
* Support kring nätverksmiljöer
* Övervakning, skriptning och automatisering av deployment av switchar/routing.
* Säkerställa krav på säkerhet och funktion.


Vi söker både juniora och seniora kandidater med bred nätverkskompetens och erfarenhet av ett eller flera av följande områden:


* LAN baserat på Cisco.
* Cisco ISE.
* Fortigate/Checkpoint.
* Automation.


För uppdraget krävs även goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, svenskt medborgarskap och godkänd säkerhetsprövning.


Sigma Technology IT Infra AB rekryterar löpande.


### **Vi erbjuder**



Vi är stolta över att våra medarbetare har röstat fram oss bland Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare i hela 11 år. Vi är också uppmärksammade som ett av Sveriges bäst förvaltade företag av Deloitte, i samarbete med Nasdaq. Förra året uppnådde vi den prestigefyllda Golden-statusen, vilket markerar vårt erkännande under flera år i rad (2019-2023).



Vi värdesätter våra medarbetare och tror på en arbetsmiljö där du kan växa och trivas. Därför erbjuder vi kollektivavtal för att säkerställa dina anställningsvillkor och trygghet. För att främja din hälsa och välbefinnande har vi ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag. Vi har också möjlighet att investera i din professionella utveckling genom kompetensutveckling (utbildningar eller certifieringar).


Vi förstår vikten av stöttning från din chef, och erbjuder en tillgänglig och öppen kommunikation för att säkerställa att du får det stöd du behöver. För att skapa en positiv start inför helgen bjuder vi in till gemensamma fredagsfrukostar där du kan koppla av och umgås med dina kollegor.


För oss är dessa förmåner och förutsättningar en självklarhet för att skapa en arbetsplats där du kan växa, må bra och känna dig som en del av sigma-gemenskapen.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan om du tror att vi är rätt arbetsgivare för dig!

title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
description:
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
Sverige Ansök senast 2024-09-30


### **Jobbeskrivning**



Hello, nice to meet you!


You have probably read a lot of job ads; this is not one of them. This is a true opportunity for you to meet other like-minded people in a growing company, combine forces and continue creating something great.


### **Grundläggande kvalifikationer**



BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
  

Are you STT? Are you our new Software Developer? To be truly successful in the role of a Software Developer at Sigma Technology Transformation, we think you:


Have a thirst for knowledge – always staying curious, keeping up-to-date and sharing what you know! Have experience of agile development and the Scrum framework



Are a team-player with a passion for development



Write code that is clean, reusable and testable



Have several years of professional experience in modern JavaScript (ES6+) creating large-scale web applications using React, Angular or Vue.



$ git commit (often)



If you also have experience with back-end development in .Net, Java, Node, Go or Python, then we think we could do even greater things together!


Knowledge of Git, Typescript, NodeJS, MongoDB, GCP, AWS, Azure, Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Github Actions, GraphQL, DevOps, CI/CD, HTTP2, TCP/IP, Linux, Containers.


### **Meriterande färdigheter, egenskaper och erfarenheter**



WE ALSO EXPECT YOU TO HAVE THESE SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS, AND EXPERIENCES


You enjoy working with a team towards a common goal.



You continuously strive to improve yourself and your output.



You have a structured and disciplined approach to work.



You are willing to learn and tackle complex challenges.



You like communicating and networking in small and large teams.


### **Vi erbjuder**



WE OFFER



Sigma Technology Transformation - STT


Created by like-minded people, for developers and agile professionals, STT is value-driven company on a mission to create true value with great people, one sprint at the time. Since 2020, we have grown to almost 30 handpicked craftsmen that are here to create a new breed of Sigma company that is kind and that loves to embrace differences. We are re-shaping the traditional through our focus on true value and the pride we take in everything we do. Nothing else is good enough – we are always striving for more.

title: Embedded Utvecklare för konsumentprodukter
description:
ESSIQ är arbetsgivaren som anstränger sig lite extra för att du ska må bra. Vad är medarbetarfokus för dig? På ESSIQ handlar det om att sätta medarbetaren i centrum. Genom ett lyhört ledarskap och en öppen företagskultur vill vi ge varje medarbetare möjligheten att forma sin karriär och sin vardag.

 **ROLLBESKRIVNING**


Som embedded-utvecklare kommer du att ansvara för att designa, utveckla och testa mjukvara i Linux-miljö. Ditt arbete kommer att utföras i nära samarbete med våra kunders agila R&D-team, där du aktivt kommer att vara involverad i integrationsprocessen av mjukvaran. Utöver detta är dokumentation och enhetstestning en viktig och naturlig del av din roll.


Vi värdesätter öppenhet och transparens, vilket innebär att varje uppdrag diskuteras noggrant med dig baserat på dina intressen och kompetenser. Vi erbjuder uppdrag inom en mängd olika branscher och samarbetar med både små startups såväl som stora utvecklingsföretag över Skåne. Som konsult hos oss har du full uppbackning och coachning från din konsultchef och ESSIQ i allting du gör för att du ska känna dig trygg och känna att du vill och kan leverera!

 **KVALIFIKATIONER**  

Vi letar inte efter anställda, vi letar efter medarbetare. Nedanstående är de grundläggande kvalifikationerna för tjänsten, men vi kommer även lägga stor vikt vid din personlighet.

**Grundläggande kvalifikationer**

* Civil- eller högskoleingenjör inom relevant område.
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av mjukvaruuteckling
* God kunskap inom C/C++
* Embedded Linux kernal
* Boot och boot loaders
* Har jobbat med Git, Gerrit och Jenkins.
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder
* Behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

**OM ESSIQ OCH VÅRT ERBJUDANDE TILL DIG**


ESSIQ är en arbetsplats med stor laganda och där allt börjar med dig, din livssituation och dina intressen. Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att forma din egen karriär, en modern lönepolicy och flexibla lösningar. Med över 200 fantastiska medarbetare, främst ingenjörer, jobbar vi med användarcentrerad tjänste- och produktutveckling där du antingen utgår från vårt kontor eller på plats hos våra kunder. Vi har mer än 80 spännande kunder inom olika branscher, allt från små innovationsbolag till stora utvecklingsföretag. Vi strävar efter att matcha dina intressen och ambitioner med rätt uppdrag. *Hos oss kommer kunden i andra hand - bra, eller hur?*


På ESSIQ värnar vi om jämställdhet och strävar efter att ha 50% kvinnliga medarbetare på samtliga positioner i företaget. Vi stödjer även organisationer som främjar och lockar unga kvinnor att studera tekniska ämnen på högskolan för att på sikt öka antalet kvinnor i teknikbranschen. Dessutom har vi ett medvetet miljöarbete för att minska vår miljöbelastning och bidra till ett mer hållbart samhälle. Vi samarbetar långsiktigt med kunder som möjliggör att vi kan arbeta med hållbara ingenjörsuppdrag som har positiva miljöeffekter.

 **ANSÖKAN**

  

Vi rekryterar löpande så skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Vid frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Mikael Häll via mikael.hall@essiq.se  

  

Vill du veta mer om ESSIQ?  

Besök **http://essiq.se** och följ oss på sociala medier!

title: Software Engineer (Vehicle Control Simulations)
description:
**Software development that makes a difference**

  


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. Now we are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.

  


**About the team**

  

  

We are a group of software developers, automotive engineers, data scientists, physicists, and generally nice and interesting people from around the world who like to work together to create the best-in-class simulation environment for autonomous drive (AD) and advanced drive assistance systems (ADAS). Our group *Software-in-the-loop Environments* is part of the R&D organization *Safe Vehicle Automation*, which is responsible for all AD/ADAS and vehicle control software which run on Volvo Cars’ vehicles. Our tools are used across the organization to test, verify, and validate software and ensure we deliver the safest cars on the market.

  


**What you will do**

  


You will be part of the Vehicle Control Software-in-Loop scrum team, which is developing and maintaining a state-of-the-art toolchain to test the software controlling the vehicle’s lateral and longitudinal movement in closed-loop. The team is responsible for creating all the models needed to simulate the vehicle to properly excite the software under test, for integrating the software with the simulation environment, for running the closed-loop simulations, and for providing a framework to manage the test flow. We use both in-house tools developed in python, C++ and Matlab Simulink, and commercial tools like IPG CarMaker, Hexagon Adams Car, and Synopsys Silver / Test Weaver to create the best solution for our users. Depending on your interest and experience, you will be able to contribute to different areas of the product, from customer-facing user support to behind the curtains tech development, making it a varied, rewarding and fun day at work.

  


**Who you are**

  


You probably have a M.Sc. or PhD in physics, mechatronics, automotive engineering or similar fields and you have experience with simulations and/or software testing. You are a team player who enjoys finding solutions for loosely defined problems in a fast-changing environment. Ideally you have experience in vehicle modeling and have worked before with modeling powertrain, steering, or braking systems in a closed-loop simulation context. Software development experience and knowledge of CI/CD principles is a plus.

  


**Minimum requirements**

  


* M.Sc. in physics, mechatronics, automotive engineering or similar fields
* Vehicle modeling experience (powertrain, steering, braking)
* Simulation experience.

  


**Location :** Gothenburg

  


**Want to know more? We hope so**

  


We welcome you to apply in english before 29th July the latest. We will go through applications on a regular basis. Please apply through the provided link. Applications submitted via email will not be retained or taken into consideration. Once you receive a confirmation email from the system, your application will be acknowledged.

  


**Who are we?**

  


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Systems Administrator III
description:
**Job Description**


As part of the Thermo Fisher Scientific team, you’ll discover meaningful work that makes a positive impact on a global scale. Join our colleagues in bringing our Mission to life every single day to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. We provide our teams with the resources needed to achieve individual career goals while helping to take science a step beyond by developing solutions for some of the world’s toughest challenges, like protecting the environment, making sure our food is safe or helping find cures for cancer.

**How will you make an impact?**

* Apply troubleshooting techniques to provide solutions to our customers' individual needs.
* Learn and use new technologies.
* Build partnerships at all levels of the organization to analyze and translate business requirements into technical requirements.
* Together with business community, help to identify business value and to prioritize requirements according to expected business benefits.
* Collaborate with developers and subject authorities to establish the technical vision and analyze tradeoffs between usability and performance needs and define concepts under direction of project leaders.
* Prepare and implement test plans, communication and training to end users for new functionality.
* Ability to automate processes and procedures for new technical environments.

**Education & Experience**
--------------------------

* Computer Science, Information Technology, or other related field of study, or equivalent experience
* 3-5+ years of professional experience in a multi-layered environment with a main focus with structured and unstructured technical services.
* Experience with Windows server, Linux, Oracle, MS SQL Server, NetApp.
* Experience with ETL tools, SQL language and interface technologies.
* Strong analytical skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into application and operational requirements.
* Understanding of project management lifecycle, including Agile methodology.
* Experience with change management iincluding operational and user documentation n a regulated business (medical devices).
* Experience with performance & tuning, tackle, high availability and disaster recovery.
* Experience with IT security (Active Directory, databases, firewalls).

  

Our Mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Watch as our colleagues explain 5 reasons to work with us. As one team of 100,000+ colleagues, we share a common set of values - Integrity, Intensity, Innovation and Involvement - working together to accelerate research, solve complex scientific challenges, drive technological innovation and support patients in need. #StartYourStory at Thermo Fisher Scientific, where diverse experiences, backgrounds and perspectives are valued.
company_description: At Thermo Fisher Scientific, our professionals develop critical solutions—and build rewarding careers.
